articles.title: Confirmed Covid-19 cases in SA rise to 2 624 254 - News24
articles.description: South Africa has recorded 10 685 new confirmed Covid-19 cases, bringing the total to 2 624 254, according to the National Institute for Communicable Diseases (NICD).
articles.content:
• South Africa has recorded 10 685 new confirmed Covid-19 cases.
  • A further 553 Covid-19-related deaths have been reported, bringing total fatalities to 77 993.

articles.title: Library users in the Western Cape now have free access to e-books and audiobooks - The South African
articles.description: Western Cape library cardholders can now access e-books and audiobooks via the Libby App. The province hopes to reach a wider audience with the offering.

articles.title: Survey shows which South Africans don’t want a Covid-19 vaccine - BusinessTech
articles.description: Vaccine hesitancy is most pronounced among white adults in South Africa, which is struggling to keep immunization centres busy just three months into the rollout of its inoculation program, a survey showed.
